description.hltext_display: Arbejdsgiverjul giver ekstra milliardbeløb
description.author: Ritzau
description.content:
Arbejdsgiverjulen i år giver en stor ekstraindtjening fra flere arbejdsdage, konstaterer Dansk Erhverv.
Alle glæder sig til jul, og i år kan især arbejdsgiverne glæde sig lidt ekstra, da juleaften falder på en fredag. Dermed er både 1. og 2. juledag blot en normal weekend. Det betyder at der kun er én julerelateret helligdag i 2010, som koster arbejdsgiverne.
Det vil i år medføre en ekstra værdiskabelse i omegnen af 3,7 milliarder kroner sammenlignet med 2012, som er den næste "medarbejdervenlige" jul, fremgår det af en beregning fra organisationen Dansk Erhverv.
Faktisk har hele 2010 været et arbejdsgiverår, da flere andre helligdage også uden for december er faldet i weekenden. Blandt andet faldt 1. maj og grundlovsdag på lørdage.
Det samme gør sig gældende for julen næste år, hvor juleaften er en lørdag. Helligdagenes placering har betydning for antallet af arbejdsdage et givent år.
Antallet af arbejdsdage lå i 2007 på 224, året efter på 226 og 225 i 2009. I år når vi op på 228 dage.
- Det er især månedslønnede medarbejdere, der mærker størst forskel fra år til år, da de får det samme udbetalt uanset antallet af fridage og helligdage, siger Mira Lie Nielsen, økonom i Dansk Erhverv.
For arbejdsgiverne og samfundet betyder de ekstra arbejdsdage ekstra dage med produktion og indtjening
Til forskel fra 2010 og 2011, kan arbejdstagerne glæde sig lidt mere til julen 2012. Da falder juleaften nemlig på en mandag, og der er derfor et maksimalt antal helligdage, som falder på hverdage. Dermed er der i 2012 tre julerelaterede fridage. To mere end i år.

description.hltext_display: Wieciech, POPiHN: niejasny kierunek rozwoju OZE
description.content: Nie mamy jasności w jakim kierunku pójdzie Polska w zakresie rozwoju odnawialnych źródeł energii - powiedział Leszek Wieciech, dyrektor generalny Polskiej Organizacji Przemysłu i Handlu Naftowego (POPiHN), podczas konferencji "Nafta/Chemia 2010".

description.hltext_display: El Real Madrid descubre lo peor de Mourinho, por DIEGO TORRES
description.author: DIEGO TORRES
description.content:
Dicen que la imagen de Agustín Herrerín cayendo de espaldas sobre el césped se quedó clavada en la retina de Florentino Pérez como un recuerdo obstinado de una noche desagradable. El presidente del Madrid se fue a la cama el lunes de madrugada en estado de perplejidad y solo empezó a recuperarse cuando comprobó de primera mano que el hombre con quien compartía mesa era un actor y no un verdadero neurótico. Era José Mourinho en persona, alegremente dispuesto a devorar su faisán a las uvas con cebolletas caramelizadas. Ese fue el plato fuerte que sirvieron ayer en la comida de Navidad de la plantilla y la directiva en el palco del Bernabéu. Durante el acto, Pérez recibió las disculpas de Mourinho de parte de Silvino Louro, su ayudante, responsable de provocar el altercado con el banquillo del Sevilla que dio por tierra con Herrerín, el delegado de campo. La conversación se produjo horas después de que, en el mismo escenario, Pérez asistiera a una de las veladas más inconcebibles desde que asumió el cargo hace un año y medio. Al cabo de la jornada, el desencuentro se había superado. Pero los dirigentes madridistas afirmaron haber descubierto lo peor de Mourinho, al que ven nervioso tras la goleada del Barça.
"Hemos fichado a un gran general", dijo un directivo, celebrando más famoso, el pasado verano; "Mourinho es Alejandro Magno". Pero debieron sospechar que la ley marcial no suele coincidir con la del fútbol ni con las costumbres más arraigadas en Chamartín. No imaginaron que, tras completar un partido desapacible y conseguir y después de que Louro montara una trifulca cuyo máximo perjudicado fue Herrerín, de 74 años y que lleva más de casi cinco décadas cumpliendo su servicio con discreción, Mourinho y lamentándose del mal funcionamiento de una institución que le deja solo, expuesto a peligros oscuros. "Quiero pedir una reunión con el presidente", repitió como si estuviese harto de todo. "Si el presidente es el número uno, yo quiero reunirme con el número uno", insistió como si no hablase casi a diario con Pérez, como si fuese un empleado marginado.
A Pérez le alarmó la reacción porque percibió que aquello, más allá de representar un choque contra el director general, Jorge Valdano, escondía un extraño desafío a su autoridad. Mourinho es consciente de que el poder no lo tiene Valdano, con quien mantiene una relación fría y cordial, sino el presidente. En el club saben que Mourinho quiere fichar un delantero centro y está molesto porque cree que no obedecen a sus exigencias. Saben que quiere más poder. Saben que pretende cambiar hasta las costumbres más viejas para ajustarlo todo a su método. Quiere ser duro con los árbitros. Como hacía en el Inter si el equipo jugaba mal, perdía o empataba: les declaraba una guerra institucional. "El Barça se quejó de los colegiados durante 80 años", decían ayer los directivos, "y fueron sus peores años".
En el calcio, Mourinho aplicó todo su arsenal interpretativo. En Italia, donde la teatralidad es parte de la cultura, sus despliegues resultaron incluso eficaces. En España a la audiencia le resulta más complicado asumir que todo es una actuación. Le resultó difícil incluso a Pérez, que habla frecuentemente con Mourinho y el domingo se sintió incómodo, asombrado al descubrir que su relación con el entrenador con el que soñó será más tortuosa de lo que pensaba.
En los seis meses que lleva al frente del Madrid, Mourinho ha desplegado todo su talento como técnico. Los dirigentes y los jugadores han descubierto lo mejor de su repertorio, pero también lo peor, sobre todo . Hoy no son pocos los que perciben que, además de un excelente entrenador, es un hombre que busca ante todo sus propios intereses, que detrás de su apasionada promesa de protección se esconde un intento de manipulación y que, si no se andan con cuidado, cualquier día se quedarán a la intemperie. Así les pasó a Canales y Pedro León. Y a Valdano. Y quién sabe si a Pérez.La intempestiva reacción del técnico tras el partido con el Sevilla causa perplejidad a los dirigentes del club, que recuerdan que el Barça se quejó "durante 80 años" de los árbitros porque le iba mal

description.hltext_display: [브레이킹뷰스] 中, 유럽에 선물보따리 안겨줄까?
description.content: 런던, 12월22일 (로이터브� �이킹뷰즈) - 크리스마스 시즌이 다가왔다. 산타도 돌아왔다. 그런데 이번은 � 럽을 위한 � 물꾸러미를 짊어진 중국 산타가 등장한 듯 하다. 중국 산타를 태운 썰매는 국채 매입을 위해 � 로존 변방국으로 향� 태세다. � �어도 � 로존 안� �을 위해 중국이 "조율된 행동"을 촉구했다는 파이낸셜 타임즈의 보도를 보면 그� �다. 누가 알� 는가? 하지만 산타 역� 을 중국이 맡을 가능성은 다소 � �어 보인다. 물� 중국이 원한다면 � 럽의 산타가 � 수도 있다. � 럽중앙은행(ECB)과 달리 중국은 새로 통화를 찍어낼 필요도 없다. 인민은행이 보� 한 외환 2조6천억달러면 그리스, 아일랜드, 포르투갈 및 스페인 국채를 사들일 수 있다. 그럴 경우 � 로존 변방국의 리파이낸싱 문� �는 사라질 것이� � 로존 부채 위기 역시 오래간 � � 해질 것이다. 하지만 일부 알� �지지 않은 답례품을 � �외하� 는 중국이 이같은 호의에 대한 보상으로 심각한 거시경� � 문� �에 직면한 국가들의 국채 외에 어떤 것을 받게 � 지는 예측하기 어� �다. 그리스 부채는 내년도 GDP의 150%가 넘을 예� �이다. 따라서 그리스가 � 럽연합(EU)과 국� �통화기금(IMF)으로부터 구� �를 받� 있긴 하지만 그리스 부채가 언� 가는 구조조� � 돼야 � 가능성은 여� �하다. 중국 산타는 상상하기 어� �운 모욕이지만 헤어컷을 감당해야 � 수도 있다. 중국 산타가 받게 � � 일한 보상은 아테네에 세워질 동상 하나로 끝� 지도 모른다. 하지만 중국 산타의 존재에 더 큰 의구심을 갖는 것은 다름 아닌 그리스다. 지난 10월 원자바오 중국 총리는 아테네를 방문해 "중국은 � 로 안� �을 지지한다"며 � 럽 채권에 대한 투자를 줄이지 않을 것이라 밝혔다. 일각에서는 이를 � 로존 변방국에 대한 중국의 구� � � 호로 받아들였다. 하지만 이후 아일랜드는 위기를 향해 나아갔� � 로존 변방국 국채 수익� 은 오름세를 지속했다. 만약 중국이 대규모로 이들 국채 매입에 나섰더라면 그같은 상황은 발생하지 않았을 것이다. 또, 아마 그같은 이� 로 시장이 지금 움직이지 않는 듯 보일지도 모른다. 크리스마스니 산타는 올 것이다. 하지만 언� �나 그� �듯 산타는 없다� 믿는 이들도 있게 마� �이다. (이안 � 벨 칼럼니스트) ** 본 칼럼은 개인의 견해로 로이터의 편집 방향과 일치하지 않을 수 있습니다.원문기사-BREAKINGVIEWS-EU members will learn to deal with German puzzle-- The author is a Reuters Breakingviews columnist. The opinions expressed are his own -- By Pierre Briancon LONDON, Dec 20 (Reuters Breakingviews) - What does Germany really want? In the past year, Angela Merkel, the German chancellor, blew hot and cold on the euro zone. She long resisted the very idea of bailing out distressed euro zone countries, before agreeing to rescue Greece and the creation of the EU`s lifeboat fund. During the Irish crisis she pressured Dublin into accepting EU aid, and spooked markets by insisting that private creditors accept haircuts on sovereign debt. Within two days in November, she said the euro`s problems were "exceptionally serious" and that it would "emerge strengthened" from its predicament. Germany`s euro zone partners probably hope Merkel will soothe their worries in 2011. Is she still interested in Europe? Or is she tempted to go it alone? Is the long-term strength of the euro close to her heart? Or is her first concern to keep Germany`s export machine firing on all cylinders? Part of the problem is that too few euro zone leaders put themselves in her shoes. What would they do at the head of an aging, industrial country with problems of its own? Yes, an Irish default would have hurt German banks seriously. True, Merkel insists that private creditors must share the pain. But who would have thought six months ago that she would endorse a permanent bailout mechanism for the euro zone? And few of Merkel`s peers seem to understand Germany`s genuine puzzlement at being asked to sacrifice the rewards of past economic discipline. That said, Germany`s vulnerabilities, not its strength, provide a better opening for its partners. The country`s banking sector is in a shambles, with precarious regional lenders. The government has budgeted 480 billion euros to provide the banking sector with guarantees and recapitalisations: that`s more than the euro zone has committed to the European Financial Stability Facility for helping all its indebted members. Germany has more than one reason to keep the euro zone together -- beyond the basic fact that it remains its main export market. The challenge for Germany`s partners is to be more fiscally responsible, as the right response to the crisis and to propagate long term growth. The challenge for Berlin is to accept that not everyone in the euro zone can -- or should -- be like Germany.

description.hltext_display: Quest CE Announces New Forex Currency Trading Course in Their 2011 Firm Element Catalog
description.author: Quest CE
description.content: --(PR.com)-- Quest CE is proud to announce one of their new 2011 highly anticipated Firm Element Courses titled Forex Currency Trading. Quest authors between 30 and 50 new courses every year with course content ideas coming directly from their client base and industry surveys. A survey conducted earlier this year indicated the demand for courses covering Forex trading transactions, best practices and market analysis of the trades.Quest answered the industries demand with the new Forex Currency Trading course, authored by their in-house staff of financial services industry veterans. The course is available today for 2011 FINRA Firm Element Programs and presented in a visually pleasing and interactive e-learning course in Quests proprietary Renaissance LMS.Every year we turn to our clients and also survey the industry to tell us which topics are of interest to them, said Alan Krenke, President and CEO. The responses were overwhelmingly positive. We pooled the results from our surveys along with the discussions we had with our clients to create our 2011 Firm Element Course Catalog. It has always been a goal of Quest to maintain a current and relevant course library that is able to address the issues most beneficial to the industry.Content is KingA serious problem facing the vast majority of other Firm Element Training vendors is old and outdated content. In the financial services industry, re-releasing a firm element course catalog without updated content is irresponsible. Quest is committed to authoring 30 to 50 new Firm Element courses each year and performing a minimum of annual audits to their entire course library.Following is the course description for the new Forex Currency Trading course authored for 2011:The worlds largest most liquid market is where Forex trading transactions are made daily. Profits are derived from the selling or buying of currency pairs. The main idea is to sell high and acquire low.Forex traders buy currency expecting its value to rise. Profits include the primary investment plus the profit derived from the difference in rate when a trade is closed. Losses are calculated by looking at the leverage and difference in the closing and opening price.In this course, students will be introduced to: Forex History Terminology Types of Trades Market Mechanics Leverage Rollovers Accounts Market AnalysisNeed More Information?For questions on the new Forex Currency Trading course or to include the course in your 2011 Firm Element Training library contact Quest today at 877-593-3366 or e-mail Quest at sales@questce.com.About QuestWith a client retention rate of 95.17% and a growth rate of over 400% since January 1, 2005, more and more people are discovering why Quest CE is the Next Generation of Compliance Training Solutions.Quest CE was founded in 1986 and today serves more than 200 leading insurance carriers, broker/dealers, banks, and other financial institutions. Quest is a privately held company that does not utilize venture capital or private equity investments, allowing them to quickly meet the ever-changing needs of their clients. Quest's commitment is to provide advanced custom solutions at cost effective rates while providing a level of service that greatly surpasses that of their competitors. Quest provides a single source solution for organizations' training and compliance needs, saving their clients both time and money.###Quest CE announces their new Forex Currency Trading course. The course is available for their 2011 Firm Element Catalog along with a series of other new titles for Broker/Dealers.

description.hltext_display: No. 6 Cedar Falls boys race past I.C. West, 64-46
description.content:
IOWA CITY, Iowa - The sixth-ranked Cedar Falls boys' basketball team improved to 5-1 after defeating Iowa City West, 64-46 Tuesday.
The Tigers broke to a 16-4 first-quarter lead and didn't let the Trojans threaten. Three Cedar Falls players scored in double figures with James Harrington netting 18 points, Caleb Konieczny 12 and Tony Johnson 11.
The Tigers resume play Jan. 4 when they host Cedar Rapids Xavier.
CEDAR FALLS (5-1, 3-1) - James Harrington 6 6-6 18, Caleb Konieczny 5 0-0 12, Kalehl Brown 2 0-1 4, Isaac Boettger 4 0-0 9, Bobby Brummel 2 0-0 4, Nick Clark 0 2-2 2, Matt Klinehart 2 0-0 4, Tony Johnson 5 0-0 11. Totals 22 8-9 64.
IOWA CITY WEST (4-2, 2-2) - Dondre Alexander 2 4-4 8, Jeremy Morgan 6 0-0 14, Wyatt Lohaus 1 0-0 2, Jake Gylten 1 0-0 2, Austin Swank 1 0-0 2, Jon Seyfer 2 0-0 4, Corey Staten 1 0-0 2, Okey Ukah 6 0-0 12. 18 4-4 46.
Iowa City West 4 14 11 17 - 46
3-point goals - Cedar Falls 4 (Konieczny 2, Boettger 1, Johnson 1), Iowa City West 2 (Morgan 2). Total fouls - Cedar Falls 12, Iowa City West 13. Fouled out - Morgan.

Forty-six dogs and cats seized from home Vanderhoof resident charged with animal cruelty
description.content:
Vanderhoof Omineca Express
Animal cruelty charges have been officially laid against Vanderhoof resident Maurice LaPointe who had 46 cats and dogs taken from this property this past June by the BC SPCA.
The 25 dogs and 21 cats who have new found loving homes, were badly neglected, suffering from malnourishment, untreated injuries and internal parasites among other issues when they were seized on June 23 this year.
The BC SPCA have said they tried to check up on the animals at an earlier date but they were stopped from inspecting the property.
A search warrant was later obtained to allow them access.

description.hltext_display: Riverside search for missing man
description.content: A major search is under way in Newcastle for a man who went missing in freezing conditions after a night out with friends. Police are combing Newcastle's Quayside for Duncan Gibbon, 21, from Northallerton, North Yorkshire.He was celebrating a friend's 21st birthday in the city and was last seen leaving Fever Bar at around midnight on Saturday.Mr Gibbon was with friends who left the bar in two groups and each thought he was with the other, so he was not reported missing until Sunday.He is white, of slim to average build and 5ft 10ins, with short straight brown hair, clean-shaven, with a clear complexion and blue eyes. He was wearing dark blue denim jeans and a dark blue/grey waist-length hooded jacket. On Tuesday mountain rescue searchers joined specialist police officers in a detailed examination of undergrowth on steep banks between the Castle Keep and the Tyne.Temporary Superintendent Geoff Logan said: "Mr Gibbon has not gone missing before and so this is very out of character. "We are concerned for his welfare due to the length of time he has been missing and the cold weather conditions. "It's imperative that anyone who saw him on Saturday night or has seen him since contacts us as soon as possible so we can piece together his movements and try to find him as soon as possible." Mr Gibbon had an iPhone with him when he disappeared and officers urged him to ring them if he was able to do so.

description.hltext_display: 今后民族地区干部到中央国家机关工作比例将扩大
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
第1页:进一步加快基础设施建设 第2页:继续做好扶贫开发工作 中国网讯 12月22日下午，十一届全国人大常委会第十八次会议举行第二次全体会议，听取审议国家民族事务委员会主任杨晶所作的《关于加快少数民族和民族地区经济社会发展工作情况的报告》。中国网实时报道。
杨晶说，今后五年，是全面建设小康社会进程中极为关键的五年。实现全面建设小康社会奋斗目标，重点在少数民族和民族地区，难点也在少数民族和民族地区。加快少数民族和民族地区经济社会发展具有极端重要性和现实紧迫性。
民族地区地域辽阔、战略资源丰富、市场潜力巨大，是支撑我国未来发展的战略资源接续地。民族地区大多处于我国大江大河的上游和涵养地，是我国重要的生态屏障。搞好民族地区的生态环境保护和建设，关系国家生态安全，关系中华民族的生存发展。民族地区毗邻中亚、南亚、东南亚国家，连通亚欧，30多个民族与国外同一民族相邻而居，在我国对外开放总体格局中占有重要地位，同时又是抵御敌对势力西化、分化，维护国家安全的战略前沿。加快少数民族和民族地区经济社会发展，对于维护民族团结、社会稳定、边防巩固，实现国家长治久安，意义重大、影响深远。
我们一定要进一步增强责任感和紧迫感，坚持以科学发展观为指导，以更大的决心、更强的力度、更实的举措，努力把少数民族和民族地区经济社会发展搞上去。要深入贯彻党的民族政策和民族区域自治法，认真落实中央支持少数民族和民族地区经济社会发展的一系列政策措施，切实加大扶持力度，努力扭转民族地区与发达地区差距扩大趋势，促进基本公共服务均等化，使绝大多数民族地区基本消除农村贫困人口，人均地区生产总值、城乡居民收入赶上或超过全国平均水平，为确保全面建成小康社会奠定坚实基础。
进一步加快基础设施建设，增强民族地区发展后劲
加快发展，必须首先突破基础设施落后这个“瓶颈”。我们将着眼大局和长远，继续把支持民族地区加快基础设施建设摆在优先位置，加大中央财政投资力度，重点帮助建设一批对经济社会发展长期起支撑作用的基础设施项目。全面加快铁路、公路、民航、水运建设，加快打通省际“断头路”。优先帮助建设一批与群众生产生活密切相关的中小型公益性项目。实施水、电、路、气、房和优美环境“六到农家”工程。推进农村牧区公路建设，逐步实现有条件的乡镇、建制村通沥青路或水泥路。解决饮水安全问题和用电问题，确保群众喝上放心水、用上安全电。加强信息设施建设，着力提高信息网络普及水平，基本实现自然村和交通沿线通信信号全覆盖。
国家将坚持区别对待、分类指导，进一步完善投资政策，引导各类投资更多地投向民族地区基础设施建设。要在一定时期内提高国家建设资金投入民族地区的比重，提高对公路、铁路、民航、水利等建设项目投资补助标准。今后，凡中央安排的公益性建设项目，取消西部地区县及县以下，以及集中连片特殊困难地区州、市级配套资金，省级政府也要给予相应支持。
不断壮大特色优势产业，增强民族地区自我发展能力 发展特色优势产业是民族地区加快发展的重要途径。国家将采取有力措施，支持民族地区加快转变经济发展方式，深化优势资源转化战略，坚持走新型工业化道路，努力形成传统优势产业、战略性新兴产业和现代服务业协调发展的新格局。大力发展特色农牧业，加快转变畜牧业生产方式，着力发展龙头企业，形成一批具有民族特色的农牧业品牌。加快能源、矿产业发展。高标准、高水平地建设一批石油、天然气、煤炭、水电、风电、光伏发电等能源基地，形成国家能源接续地。加大民族地区矿产资源勘探力度，加强有色金属等资源的综合利用，形成一批深加工产业基地。大力发展新兴产业和现代服务业。大力发展满足少数民族生产生活特殊需要的特色产业。
国家实行有差别的产业政策。凡是有条件在民族地区加工转化的能源、资源开发利用项目，支持在民族地区布局建设并优先审批核准。继续对西部地区属于国家鼓励类产业的企业，减按15%税率征收企业所得税；鼓励类企业、外商投资鼓励类产业及优势产业的项目在投资总额内进口的自用设备，在政策规定范围内免征关税。实行差别化的土地政策。在安排土地利用年度计划指标时适度向民族地区倾斜，增加民族地区荒山、沙地、戈壁等未利用地建设用地指标。继续执行民族贸易优惠政策，对民族贸易和民族特需商品生产企业流动资金贷款利率在一年期贷款基准利率上降低2.88个百分点；技改贴息贷款在原有的基础上适当扩大规模。
大力发展社会事业，支持民族地区保障和改善民生
民生连着民心，关乎民族团结和社会安定。国家大力支持民族地区加强以改善民生为重点的社会建设，建立健全覆盖城乡居民的公共服务体系。优先发展教育。加大中央财政对民族地区农村义务教育转移支付力度，提高农村义务教育经费保障水平。积极稳妥地推进农牧区和偏远地区适当集中办学。加快农村寄宿制学校建设，逐步提高农村义务教育阶段家庭经济困难寄宿生生活补助标准。继续实施农村义务教育阶段教师特设岗位计划，加大对民族地区支持力度。大力发展民族教育，加强双语教学，加快普及高中阶段教育。加快发展中等职业教育，落实好中职教育免学费政策，加大对民族地区产业发展急需的优势特色学科支持力度。在贫困山区和生态脆弱地区，实施教育扶贫移民。办好内地西藏班、新疆班和内地西藏、新疆中职班。提高医疗卫生服务能力。巩固完善新型农村合作医疗和城镇居民基本医疗保险，逐步提高筹资水平和政府补助标准。

description.hltext_display: 外為特会の剰余金、中期財政フレーム期間は一般会計に全額繰入も
description.content:
［東京 ２２日 ロイター］ 財務省は２２日、外国為替資金特別会計（外為特会）において外貨資産の運用などで発生する剰余金の取り扱いについて、２０１１─２０１３年度の中期財政フレーム期間は、厳しい財政事情に配慮し、一般会計への全額繰り入れも含めて検討する、とのルールを定めて公表した。
行政刷新会議の「事業仕分け」の評価結果を踏まえたもので、外為特会の財務の健全性を確保することが目的。
現在、外為特会の積立金は、保有外貨資産の約３０％を中長期的に確保することが必要とされている。ルールでは、「当分の間、毎年度の剰余金の３０％以上を外為特会に留保し、積立金の保有外貨資産に対する割合を中長期的な必要水準に向け高めていく」ことを基本としつつ、「外為特会の財務状況や一般会計の財政状況も勘案して一般会計繰入額を決定する」とした。
ただ、現行の中期財政フレーム期間については、外為特会の内部留保額を段階的に増やしていくことをめざすが、一般会計の財政事情に「最大限」配慮し、「剰余金の一般会計への全額繰入も含めて検討する」ことを明記した。これを踏まえ、２０１１年度予算編成において、同特会の剰余金の全額を一般会計に繰り入れる。
(C) Copyright Thomson Reuters. All rights reserved.

description.hltext_display: '서귀포 제2관광단지' 개발계획 윤곽 나와
description.content: 광고 "한방ㆍ미용ㆍ대체의학 중심 단지로" (제주=연합뉴스) 홍정표 기자 = 제주 '서귀포 제2관광단지' 개발계획의 윤곽이 나왔다. 한국관광공사가 발주한 서귀포 제2관광단지 개발사업 기본설계 용역을 맡은 ㈜경호엔지니어링과 ㈜한국종합기술은 22일 제주도청에서 중간보고회를 열었다. 연구진은 보고서에서 관광단지 개발사업 예정지인 서귀포시 동홍동 미악산 일대 242만6천㎡를 한방ㆍ미용ㆍ대체의학을 중심으로 한 관광의료단지로 조성하는 방안을 제시했다. 단지에 미용센터ㆍ대체의학센터ㆍ부티크 호텔ㆍ유기농 음식촌ㆍ수(水) 치료실ㆍ전시관ㆍ승마체험장 등을 갖춰 미용과 다이어트 프로그램을 특화해 장기체류 관광객을 유치한다는 것이다. 한편, 제2관광단지에 인접한 헬스케어타운 부지 147만7천㎡는 치료를 목적으로 한 의료 중심의 의료관광단지로 특성화할 것을 제시했다. 이 단지에는 헬스케어센터ㆍ메디컬스트리트 전문병원ㆍ불로장생센터ㆍ재활훈련센터ㆍ은퇴자 거주타운ㆍ명상원ㆍ워터파크ㆍ테마 전시관 등을 갖춰 장기요양 환자와 은퇴자, 한류 관광객을 유치한다. 추정 사업비는 민간투자 9천912억원, 공공투자 1천927억원 등 모두 1조1천839억원이다. 연구진은 내년 2월 2차 보고회를 열고, 주민설명회와 환경영향평가 심의 등을 거쳐 내년 8월 최종보고서를 제출할 예정이다. 개발사업 시행자인 제주국제자유도시개발센터(JDC)는 도의회 동의 절차를 거쳐 내년 9월께 제주도에 개발사업 시행승인을 신청할 계획이다. 제주도와 관광공사, JDC는 지난 2월 제2관광단지 예정지를 헬스케어타운 부지와 연계해 개발사업을 추진키로 하고, 업무협약을 체결했다. 관광공사는 2010년부터 2011년까지 관광단지 개발사업에 따른 기본ㆍ실시설계 용역과 인ㆍ허가를 완료해 JDC에 인계하기로 했다. jphong@yna.co.kr

description.hltext_display: Fängelsedom lär överklagas
description.content:
Publicerat: tisdag 21 december kl 14:35, Peter Rosendahl dömdes nyligen i den stora Habo finanshärvan till fem års fängelse. Med största sannolikhet kommer han att överklaga domen.
Rosendahls advokat Håkan Jansson säger till Sveriges Radio Jönköping att Peter Rosendahl själv måste fatta det slutgiltiga beslutet. Men det mesta tyder på att det blir ett överklagande.
Man har till den 23 december på sig att komma in med pappren.
Enligt advokaten tycker Peter Rosendahl att domen mot honom är för hård.

description.hltext_display: Pascal Duchauffour Area Vice President für Europa, Naher Osten und Afrika
description.author: Veröffentlicht von TheRitzCarltonCompany
description.content: (firmenpresse) - Chevy Chase (USA)/Dubai, 21. Dezember 2010 Der Franzose Pascal Duchauffour zeichnet mit sofortiger Wirkung als Area Vice President für die Marken The Ritz-Carlton, Bulgari Hotels & Resorts und Edition Hotels in Europa, im Nahen Osten und Afrika verantwortlich. Hervé Humler, President und Chief Operating Officer der , L.L.C., überträgt Duchauffour somit die operative Entwicklung und Portfolio-Erweiterung der drei Luxusmarken in der Region EMEA (Europe-Middle East-Africa). Vor seiner Beförderung war der 44-Jährige in Doppelfunktion für die fünf bestehenden Ritz-Carlton Hotels im Nahen Osten und als Generaldirektor für das im Januar 2011 eröffnende The Ritz-Carlton, Dubai International Financial Centre zuständig. Bevor ihn sein Weg nach Dubai führte, leitete Pascal Duchauffour von 2003 bis 2007 ebenfalls als General Manager das The Ritz-Carlton, Bahrain Hotel & Spa. Er fungierte darüber hinaus als Resident Manager in den Ritz-Carlton Hotels in Singapur und als Hotel Manager in Schanghai. Während seiner sechsjährigen Tätigkeit im The Ritz-Carlton, San Francisco bekleidete Duchauffour unterschiedlichste Positionen und war dort maßgeblich in der ersten der beiden erfolgreichen Bewerbungen um den Malcolm Baldridge National Quality Award des Amerikanischen Wirtschaftsministeriums involviert. Weiterhin unterstützte er mit seiner Erfahrung zahlreiche Hoteleröffnungen, beispielsweise in Beijing Central Place, Seoul, Kuala Lumpur und Double Bay in Australien. Bevor er 1991 zur stieß, arbeitete er im im Hôtel Le Meurice in Paris, im Four Seasons Hotel Inn on the Park in London und im Hôtel de Crillon in Paris, wo sein Einstieg in die Hotellerie begannn. 2011 kann der in Paris geborene Duchauffour auf 20 Jahre erfolgreiche Jahre bei The Ritz-Carlton zurückblicken. In Dubai ansässig, widmet er seine Freizeit seinen vier Kindern sowie dem Marathonlauf, Fußball und Karting. Unternehmensinformation / Kurzprofil: Anmerkungen für Redaktionen: , L.L.C. mit Sitz in Chevy Chase, Maryland (USA) betreibt 73 Hotels und Resorts in Nord- und Südamerika, Europa, Asien, Afrika und im Nahen Osten. Über 30 weitere Hotels und Eigentumsanlagen sind in Voreröffnung oder Planung, darunter Dubai International Financial Centre (UAE) und in Hongkong. The Ritz-Carlton ist das einzige Dienstleistungsunternehmen, das zweimal in Folge den renommierten Qualitätspreis Malcolm Baldrige National Quality Award des amerikanischen Wirtschaftsministeriums für außergewöhnlichen Kundenservice gewonnen hat. Informationen und gebührenfreie Reservierungen unter Telefon 0800-1812334 (in Deutschland), Telefon 0800-201127 (in Österreich) und Telefon 0800-553986 (in der Schweiz) sowie unter www.ritzcarlton.com. , L.L.C. ist hundertprozentiges Tochterunternehmen von Marriott International, Inc. (NYSE:MAR). description.hltext_display: Hitt krijgt opdrachten in Vietnam, Duitsland en Zweden
description.content:
AMSTERDAM (Dow Jones)--Hitt nv (HITT.AE) heeft orders gekregen ter waarde van EUR3 miljoen in Vietnam, Duitsland en Zweden, maakt de leverancier van verkeersbegeleidingssystemen voor luchthavens woensdag bekend.
Voor de grootste internationale luchthaven in Vietnam, Ton San Nhat International Airport, ontving Hitt een aankondiging van contractgunning voor een begeleidingssysteem voor het grondverkeer. Het systeem wordt eind 2011 opgeleverd.
Voor de luchthaven van Frankfurt en voor Landvetter Airport in het Zweedse Gothenburg levert Hitt upgrades van systemen die al eerder werden geleverd aan de luchtverkeersleidingorganisaties van deze landen.
Door Archie van Riemsdijk; Dow Jones Nieuwsdienst; +31-20-5715 210, archie.vanriemsdijk@dowjones.com

description.hltext_display: Presidente do Milan mostra desapontamento com atuações de Ronaldinho
description.content:
Silvio Berlusconi comemora acerto com Cassano e lamenta momento do brasileiro no clube
Nos próximos dias, o atacante Antônio Cassano deve assinar um contrato longo com o Milan, até 2014. Silvio Berlusconi, presidente do clube, comemora o acerto com o novo reforço, ao mesmo tempo que se diz decepcionado com o desempenho de Ronaldinho na equipe. O jogador está na mira do Grêmio e de outros clubes brasileiros, além do Los Angeles Galaxy, dos EUA.
– É um pecado, neste momento ele não é o mesmo em campo – comentou o presidente, segundo o site italiano Tuttosport.
Nos últimos jogos do Milan, Ronaldinho vem entrando nos minutos finais do segundo tempo. Analisando o time de uma forma geral, no entanto, Berlusconi faz elogios:
– Estou contente, a equipe está jogando bem – destacou.
A manifestação do mandatário do Milan dá uma esperança a mais ao Grêmio, que tenta de todas as formas repatriar o jogador formado no Olímpico.

description.hltext_display: Lawyer suing over judge-nominating panel denied hearing
description.author: BARBARA HOBEROCK
description.content: OKLAHOMA CITY - Oklahoma City attorney Jerry Fent said Tuesday that he is disappointed that he will not get a hearing on his request to halt the proceedings of the Judicial Nominating Commission. Fent filed suit Monday, challenging the panel that interviews applicants for vacant judicial slots and recommends names to the governor for selection. "I am shocked and disappointed that they will not allow me a hearing on the temporary stay issue," he said. Fent alleges that the panel is unconstitutional because its membership is based on six congressional districts, rather than the five the state currently has. The panel is now helping to select an Oklahoma Supreme Court justice after the death of Justice Marian Opala earlier this year. Fent tentatively was granted a Monday hearing on his request for a stay. His request was later denied. He has asked that five of the eight current justices recuse themselves from the lawsuit because the allegedly illegal Judicial Nominating Commission was involved in their nominations to the governor, who makes the final decision. Fent also asked that State Question 752 be tossed out because it failed to correct the structure of the Judicial Nominating Commission. Approved by voters in November, the measure adds two seats to the 13-member panel, among other things. Had a stay been granted, the panel could not move forward with making recommendations to the governor for a successor for Opala, Fent said. Controversy surrounds who will make the appointment. Gov.-elect Mary Fallin, a Republican, will be sworn in Jan. 10 to succeed Gov. Brad Henry, a Democrat who has appointed five members to the Oklahoma Supreme Court. Original Print Headline: Hearing denied in judge-nominating panel suit Barbara Hoberock (405) 528-2465 barbara.hoberock@tulsaworld.com

description.hltext_display: غلظت بالاي ذرات معلق،بازهم هواي تهران را ناسالم كرد
UAE- Regulator seeks listing of family, private firms
description.content:
(MENAFN - Khaleej Times) The Emirates Stocks and Commodities Authority (SCA), the UAE market regulator, on Tuesday recommended to the government to encourage family and private companies to list on the markets.
The reconstituted SCA board, which met here under the chairmanship of UAE Minister of Economy Sultan bin Saeed Al Mansouri, noted that steps taken by the government in the wake of financial crisis had played an effective role in boosting stability on the markets.
"It also recommended the encouraging of family and private companies to list on the markets and the need for goodwill signals from the government in supporting the markets through the amendment of related legislations."
The UAE currently has three stock exchanges - the Abu Dhabi Securities Exchange, Dubai Financial Market and Nasdaq Dubai.
Training programmes
The board, which allowed margin trading, also approved the setting up of a programme for training of UAE nationals working in brokerage companies and those interested in working in that sector.
After reviewing the list of percentage of UAE nationals working in the biggest 10 brokerage companies in the country, the board approved a suggestion which calls for setting up of a special training programme for UAE nationals working in the securities sector and those interested in working in that sector.
The board approved a memo containing the SCA's programmes and activities for the year 2011. It includes awareness programmes to educate the public about many important issues including the new SCA regulations like the mutual fund regulations, Twin-Peaks system of securities markets, better understanding of the issues relating to investment on the securities markets. Also educational programmes for financial brokers, analysts and other stakeholders would be launched.
The mechanisms for the implementation of the programmes include holding of a number of lectures, workshops and conferences.
The meeting, which was the fourth by the newly-reconstituted board, was attended by all board members, including Mohammed bin Ali bin Zayed Al Falasi, Deputy Board Chairman; Abdullah Salim Al Turifi, SCA Chief Executive Officer; Mubarak Rashid Al Mansoori, Mohammed Ali Ahmed Al Dhahiri, Abdullah bin Ali Al Hamli and Butti Khalifa bin Darwish Al Falasi.
Also present at the meeting were Ibrahim Al Za'abi, Deputy CEO for Licensing, Supervision and Enforcement Affairs, who is the board's Rapporteur and Maryam Al Suwaidi, Deputy CEO for Legal Affairs, Issuance and Research, as the board's Coordinator.
By Haseeb Haider

description.hltext_display: Une fillette de sept ans dont la vie a été sauvée est à l?origine d?une mission visant à sauver un millier de personnes souffrant de graves problèmes cardiaques dans le monde
description.content:
BIOTRONIK et collaborent pour changer les choses
Une fillette de sept ans dont la vie a été sauvée est à l'origine d'une mission visant à sauver un millier de personnes souffrant de graves problèmes cardiaques dans le monde , l'un des principaux fabricants mondiaux d'appareils cardiovasculaires implantables, a annoncé aujourd'hui une importante réalisation dans le cadre de son partenariat avec (HBI) : l'implantation d'un dispositif cardiovasculaire offert, pour sauver la vie d'Yuleisy Daniela Banos Peraldo, une petite Équatorienne de sept ans.
L'implantation a été effectuée après une procédure de remplacement valvulaire mitral par le Dr Gerardo Davalos de la « Fundacion Banco de Marcapasos », à l'hôpital pour enfants Baca Ortiz. La jeune patiente s'est bien remise de la procédure et a pu rentrer chez elle, auprès de sa famille.
« Sans le dispositif cardiovasculaire offert par BIOTRONIK, la jolie petite Yuleisy n'aurait pas pu vivre une vie d'enfant, pleine de liberté, d'amusement, d'audace et de joie. Sa santé aurait continué de se détériorer considérablement, jusqu'à ce que sa vie soit en péril », a déclaré le Dr Attilio Birga, Président de Heartbeat International Équateur. « Grâce à la collaboration mise en?uvre avec des entreprises comme BIOTRONIK pour fournir des traitements gratuits aptes à sauver des vies à des malades cardiaques dans le besoin, nous donnons à d'autres patients comme Yuleisy un nouvel espoir de mener une vie en bonne santé et d'envisager un avenir riche de possibilités ».
Chaque année, entre un et trois millions de personnes meurent parce qu'elles n'ont pas les moyens d'acquérir un dispositif cardiovasculaire. HBI, une fondation caritative à but non lucratif basée aux États-Unis, et BIOTRONIK se sont alliées pour faire baisser ce chiffre. BIOTRONIK fait don de dispositifs à HBI, laquelle gère ensuite le planning et supervise le réseau qui apporte les dispositifs aux médecins qui mettent en?uvre les procédures d'implantation.
« L'engagement de HBI pour sauver des vies dans les pays en voie de développement va de pair avec la détermination de BIOTRONIK à garantir que des malades dans le besoin ont accès à des dispositifs cardiovasculaires de qualité qui leur sauveront la vie, indépendamment de leur statut économique ou social », a déclaré Marlou Janssen, Vice-présidente mondiale du Marketing et des ventes chez BIOTRONIK. « Nous sommes fiers de faire partie de l'équipe de HBI et nous avons l'intention de continuer à soutenir les efforts admirables de la fondation avec pour objectif d'aider plus d'un millier de malades cardiaques grâce à des dispositifs BIOTRONIK au cours des 3 prochaines années ».
À propos de BIOTRONIK
BIOTRONIK figure parmi les principaux fabricants mondiaux d'appareils cardiovasculaires, avec plusieurs millions de dispositifs implantés, et est représentée dans plus de 100 pays. Ses effectifs s'élèvent à plus de 5 600 collaborateurs dans le monde. Réputée pour être toujours au fait des dernières attentes de la communauté médicale, BIOTRONIK évalue les défis rencontrés par les médecins et fournit les meilleures solutions pour toutes les phases des soins aux patients, qu'il s'agisse du diagnostic, du traitement ou du suivi. BIOTRONIK se définit par la qualité, l'innovation et l'excellence clinique, ainsi que par une réussite toujours renouvelée. La société jouit de la confiance des médecins et patients du monde entier, et leur apporte la tranquillité d'esprit qu'ils attendent.
www.biotronik.com À propos de , Inc. (HBI) est une fondation caritative à but non lucratif, membre d'Independent Charities of America. La mission d'HBI est de sauver des vies en fournissant gratuitement des dispositifs cardiovasculaires implantables et des traitements aux patients indigents dans le monde entier. HBI reçoit directement ses dispositifs de la part des fabricants d'appareils médicaux, puis les distribue via son réseau mondialde Centres du c?ur. On estime que de 1 à 3 millions de personnes décèdent chaque année car elles ne peuvent pas se permettre l'implantation du stimulateur cardiaque qui peut les sauver. Mais le problème ne fera qu'empirer puisque les maladies cardiovasculaires continuent d'augmenter dans les pays en voie de développement.
www.heartbeatsaveslives.com

description.content: 두바이� 가격 � �� 대비, 배럴당 97센트 오른 90.31달러 기록[CBS산업부 박종환 기자] 두바이� 등 국� �� 가가 2년여만에 최� 치를 기록하면서 물가불안 요인으로 작용하� 있다.22일 한국석� 공사에 따르면, 21일 거래된 두바이� 가격은 � �� 에 비해 배럴당 97센트 오른 90.31달러를 기록했다.지난 5월 25일 올해 최� �가(68.28달러)보다 무� � 22.03달러 오른 데다, 배럴당 90달러를 웃돈 것은 2008년 9월 이후 처음이다.우리나라는 중동산 원� 도입 비중이 80% 이상이며, 두바이� 는 중동산 원� 의 대표 � 종으로 활용되� 있다.런던 석� 거래소(ICE)의 북해산 브� �트� 와 뉴욕 상업거래소(NYMEX)의 서부텍사스산 원� (WTI)의 내년 2월 인도분 � 물 가격도 각각 93.20달러와 89.82달러로 지난 2008년 9월, 2008년 10월 이후 최� 가격을 기록했다.이 같은 국� �� 가 오름세는 석� 수급에 따른 것이라기보다는 미국 � �부가 11월부터 시행에 들어간 2차 양� � 완화� �책과 석� 시장으로의 자금 � 입, 세계 경기회복에 대한 기대감 등이 어우러진 결과로 풀이된다.한국은행은 국� �� 가가 10% 오르면 2주~4주의 시차를 두� 소비자 물가가 0.2%p 높아지는 효과가 있는 것으로 보� 있다.석� 공사 해외석� 동향팀 구자권 팀장은 "수급상황으로만 본다면 현 � 가는 비� �상� �으로 높다"며 "이 같은 � 가가 장기화되기는 어� �울 것"이라� 관측했다.민관합동으로 구성된 `국� �� 가� �문가협의회`는 두바이� 를 기준으로 한 내년도 국� �� 가는 올해 78달러(예상치) 보다 2~7달러 오른 80~85달러에 이를 것으로 예상했다.cbs2000@cbs.co.kr[관� �기사](대한민국 중심언� CBS 뉴스FM98.1 / 음악FM93.9 / TV CH 412)www.nocutnews.co.kr) 무단� �재 및 재배포 금지

description.hltext_display: Argentina: Prisão perpétua para 12 violadores de direitos humanos na ditadura militar
description.content:
Buenos Aires, 22 dez (Inforpress) – Um tribunal argentino condenou na terça-feira a prisão perpétua 12 violadores dos direitos humanos durante a última ditadura militar no país, acusados de 181 crimes cometidos em três centros clandestinos de detenção, informaram fontes judiciais.
O mesmo tribunal de Buenos Aires também condenou a 25 anos de prisão outros quatro réus e absolveu um, adiantaram as fontes.
Os condenados são antigos polícias, militares e quadros dos serviços secretos.
As sentenças foram recebidas com aplausos por parte de activistas dos direitos humanos.
No julgamento, que durou 13 meses, foram analisados 181 crimes cometidos contra parte dos 1500 detidos ilegalmente nos antigos centros de Club Atlético, Banco e Olimpo durante a ditadura (1976-1983).
Num outro julgamento em Mar del Plata, um tribunal federal condenou a prisão perpétua três antigos militares por crimes contra a humanidade cometidos numa prisão ilegal que funcionou na base naval da cidade, situada a cerca de 400 quilómetros a sul de Buenos Aires.

description.hltext_display: Südwest Presse: Kommentar zu Westerwelle
description.content:
Ulm (ots) - Guido Westerwelle ist als Parteichef nicht mehr zu
halten. Offen ist nur noch, wann er es selbst einsieht und wie lange
er seiner Partei die mit der Diskussion verbundene Belastung zumutet.
Mit jedem Tag, den er wartet, wird allerdings auch sein Verbleib im
Außenministerium ungewisser. Es wird nun, falls der gescheiterte Held
vergangener Tage nicht im fernen Ägypten ein Einsehen hat, über den
Jahreswechsel ein unschönes Kesseltreiben zu besichtigen sein. Daran
beteiligt sind zum einen die FDP-Kandidaten bei den anstehenden
Wahlen, die ein oft existenzielles Interesse daran haben, ein
Desaster zu verhindern und zumindest in Fraktionsstärke in die
Landtage einzuziehen. Es sind die FDP-Aktiven an der Basis, die
demnächst in den Fußgängerzonen für liberale Politik werben wollen
und nicht nur hämischen Kommentaren über ihren am Stuhl klebenden
Vorsitzenden begegnen. Es gibt aber auch nicht Wenige, die die FDP
als Sachwalterin von Bürgerrechten und -freiheiten für unverzichtbar
halten in der deutschen Parteienlandschaft. Und auch als Verfechterin
einer von staatlicher Gängelung und Subventionierung möglichst
befreiten Marktwirtschaft. Die haben schmerzlich erfahren, dass das
einstige Zugpferd Westerwelle gerade diese urliberalen Tugenden
schmählich vernachlässigt und in der FDP-Klientel eine Enttäuschung
nach der anderen ausgelöst hat. Das ist sein eigentliches Versagen.
Originaltext: Südwest Presse
Digitale Pressemappe: http://www.presseportal.de/pm/59110
Pressemappe via RSS : http://www.presseportal.de/rss/pm_59110.rss2

description.hltext_display: 东乡县加快医疗卫生基础设施建设
description.content:
本报讯 今年，东乡县不断提升基本公共卫生和基本医疗服务水平，使全县医疗卫生基础设施建设实现了跨越式发展。
该县投资2770万元新建的11794平方米的县医院一期工程门诊医技楼已完成六层框架主体工程，投资164.84万元的唐汪中心卫生院整体搬迁建设项目现已竣工并投入使用。那勒寺中心卫生院住院部建设项目已开工建设，现已完成基础工程；编制上报汪集中心卫生院住院部建设项目可研报告；嘉道理慈善基金会援建项目已完成项目设计等前期工作，计划明年初开工建设。通过农村卫生服务体系建设项目的支持，为全县229个行政村的卫生所(室)配备了检查床、药品柜、小冰箱、消毒锅等基本医疗设备共2300多台(件)，价值达180多万元。编制上报了《东乡县卫生事业发展“十二五”规划》，为进一步满足人民群众日益增长的医疗卫生需求提供了坚实的基础。 (苏文夫)

description.hltext_display: KLM haalt banden aan met Malaysian Airline
description.content:
KUALA LUMPUR (Dow Jones)--KLM heeft woensdag een principeovereenkomst gesloten met Malaysian Airline System bhd (3786.KU) om de banden tussen beide luchtvaartmaatschappijen te versterken.
"Deze samenwerking is een belangrijke mijlpaal voor de twee nationale luchtvaartmaatschappijen en maakt de weg vrij voor een potentiele nauwere samenwerking. De voordelen zijn betere verbindingen, betere vliegschema's en meer keuzes voor de consument", zeiden beide bedrijven in een gezamenlijke verklaring.
KLM, dochter van Air France-KLM (AF.FR) en Malaysian Airline gaven geen specifieke details over de geplande samenwerking.
De twee maatschappijen hebben al een code-sharing overeenkomst op routes tussen hun hubs in Amsterdam en Kuala Lumpur, alsook op andere geselecteerde routes binnen Europa en Australazie, het gebied rond Australie, Nieuw-Zeeland en Nieuw-Guinea.
Door K.P. Lee, Dow Jones Nieuwsdienst: +31-20-5715210; amsterdam@dowjones.com

description.hltext_display: Winter only officially just upon us
description.content:
Vanderhoof Omineca Express
BC North
Though it may appear otherwise, winter will only officially start December 21 at 3:39 p.m.
Each year has two solstices which mark both the longest and shortest days of the year.
Summer solstice in June is the beginning of summer and the shortening of daylight in the Northern hemisphere; winter solstice, six months later in December, is the beginning of winter and the lengthening of days in the Northern hemisphere.
In some ancient and even modern cultures the solstices come with festivals and celebrations.
Early Christian communities transformed some of the practices into excepted parts of Christmas celebrations.
“Let us love winter, for it is the spring of genius.”
-- Pietro Aretino

description.hltext_display: Para dirigente, força da camisa faz Grêmio sair na frente por Ronaldinho
description.content:
César Cidade Dias, integrante da nova direção, espera acerto para a pré-Libertadores
O Grêmio estreia na pré-Libertadores dia 26 de janeiro, contra o Liverpool, em Montevidéu. Até lá, os dirigentes esperam já ter confirmado a contratação de Ronaldinho. César Cidade Dias acredita em final feliz, e não teme a concorrência de outros clubes brasileiros, como o Flamengo.
– Existe uma concorrência desleal, que é a nossa camisa. Ela vale muito para o Ronaldo, a gente tem recebido muitas mensagens da parte deles nesse sentido. Isso conta muito para a família Assis – destacou o dirigente à Rádio Gaúcha nesta terça.
Não é de hoje o interesse do Grêmio na volta de Ronaldinho, os contatos já duram há algum tempo. Reuniões realizadas em outros momentos já fazem com que Cidade Dias defina a situação como "avançada".
– Acho que a negociação está avançada, o presidente (Paulo Odone) está sendo hábil. Quando a gente conseguir chegar a um ponto comum, ele vai anunciar, mas não tem como dizer uma data, é uma negociação difícil – disse.
O irmão e empresário de Ronaldinho, Assis, vai para a Itália conversar com a direção do Milan para tentar encaminhar a negociação. Sobre valores, o clube tricolor mantém sigilo.
– O Grêmio trata com sigilo as questões relacionadas a números e não vamos falar nisso, é importante – ressaltou.
O desejo é já ter Ronaldinho para o início da Libertadores.
– Esperamos que sim, esperamos o apoio do torcedor também – projetou.
Na Itália, o presidente do Milan, Silvio Berlusconi, mostra desapontamento com as atuações de Ronaldinho, dando mais esperanças aos gremistas que querem ver o craque de volta ao Olímpico.
Leia mais sobre o assunto:

description.hltext_display: Pua: DAP became Utusan Malaysia's obsession
description.author: Kitty Lim
description.content:
KUALA LUMPUR - DAP claimed on Wednesday that the Umno-owned Utusan Malaysia has completely lost the plot with its "daily extensive attacks against DAP", adding that the Malay daily is the largest hindrance to national unity.
Petaling Jaya Utara MP Tony Pua said in his statement that: "Never before in history has the DAP, a party Utusan Malaysia has previously regarded as irrelevant, become the object of obsession to the Umno-owned newspaper."
He was referring to the relentless attacks of Utusan against DAP in the past few days, which saw in the newspaper's front page with headlines like "Muslihat DAP”, “Guan Eng dikecam” and “Umat Islam perlu tolak DAP” on the 18, 20 and 21 December respectively.
He cited more examples which he said are "dedications" of columns to DAP: “DAP perkudakan Anwar”, “DAP alat politik negara asing”, “DAP salur matlumat kepada Kuan Yew?”, “DAP gentar dengan 1Malaysia”.
"The above hasn't taken into account the fact that for the past year, Utusan has often granted DAP leaders exclusive frontpage coverage to Karpal Singh, Teo Nie Ching and even myself, for daring to suggest that the housing discount for the wealthy bumiputeras be channelled towards helping the bumiputera poor," Pua said.
Pua also claimed that Utusan's "obsessions" to attack DAP had caused the newspaper declining circulation, which he said was correlated with an increment of its articles on DAP.
Utusan's circulation, he said, had plummeted 33.8 percent in five years, which recorded a drastic drop from 256,247 in 2004 to 213,445 in 2006 and 169,548 in 2009.
"Profit before tax for the newspaper group has also plunged from RM21 million to RM7 million over the past 4 years," he said.
"It appears that Utusan is attempting to rationalise its loss of readership due to external factors instead of looking inwards at their incessant racial posturing, outright lies and inflammatory headlines such as “Bangkitlah Melayu” as being the main causes.
"In fact, based on the statistics, there is a correlation between the rapidly increasing attacks against the DAP and the rapidly declining circulation of the newspaper.
According to Pua, a Google search with the word "DAP" in Utusan based on the year of publication would show 291 results in 2007, 876 results in 2008, 12,400 in 2009 results and 28,800 in 2010.
"It is most laughable when Utusan had to plead to its readers not to boycott the paper due to “political sentiments” (“Pembaca akhbar tidak boleh terikut-ikut tindakan memboikot Utusan Malaysia kerana sentimen politik...”) and blame Pakatan Rakyat for its affected business," the DAP publicity chief said.
Pua further claimed that Utusan's "bias" stance and ongoing attacks against the opposiition will only serves to prove that DAP and PR are making major inroads to prove their competency in governance.
"We have proven that despite having a DAP chief minister in Penang, Malays and Muslims enjoy greater rights and benefits than under a BN administration. This is due to a more caring government, which is able to fund its welfare policies through more effective and efficient administration," he said.
Pua said Utusan journalist Hata Wahari, who is also the National Union of Journalist (NUJ) president, had demanded that the newspaper stop its "biased" reporting.
Pua pointed out that Hata had claimed that Utusan's editorial policies were against “journalistic ethics" as positive coverage was given to Barisan Nasional (BN) while negative reports were specifically reserved for PR.
"Even the Minister in the Prime Minister’s department Nazri Aziz had accused Utusan of becoming “racist” in its reporting in September this year," he said.
"In fact, Utusan is a proven liar with leading opposition figures, MP for Pokok Sena, Mahfuz Omar and Tenaganita Director, Irene Fernandez, awarded RM120,000 and RM200,000 in damages respectively in defamation suits against the paper," Pua added.
Utusan had recently called to abolish DAP which it accused being a foreign government tool. The Malay daily also reported remarks from certain Umno leaders who had called the party as "king of racism", The Malaysian Insider reported.
Penang Chief Minister Lim Guan Eng had subsequently announced that he would file a defamation suit against Utusan for allegedly publishing "lies" about him and the state administration.
"I had on 1 November 2010 challenged Utusan Malaysia to an open debate on its many allegations against the “racist” DAP. Unfortunately, the editors chose not to defend their allegations with facts and figures in the open but continued to throw baseless, wild and wicked accusations against the DAP," Pua said.
He added: "The Prime Minister, despite his call for “moderation” in reporting, has failed to reign in his party's newspaper and his 1Malaysia policy will only fail as a result of Utusan's extremist and racist reporting."

description.hltext_display: Online petition urges Iran to free filmmaker Jafar Panahi
description.author: Kiran Pahwa
description.content:
London, Dec 22 - An online petition that is expected to signed by filmmakers and actors from across the world calls for the release of dissident Iranian director Jafar Panahi who has been sentenced to six years in prison and banned for directing films for 20 years.
The online petition claims that "Jafar is innocent and his only crime is wishing to continue to freely exercise his profession as a film-maker in Iran ... Through this sentence inflicted upon Jafar Panahi, it is manifestly all of Iranian cinema which is targeted", The Guardian reported.
Panahi won the Camera d'Or award at the Cannes film festival in 1995 for "The White Balloon" and the Golden Lion prize at the 2000 Venice festival for "The Circle". His other movies include "Offside" and "Crimson Gold".
A group of European film organisations, including the Cannes film festival and the magazine Cahiers du Cinema, prepared the petition.
It has sought the signatures of writers, filmmakers and actors, "as well as every man and woman who loves freedom and for whom human rights are fundamental".
Jafar Panahi is a critic of the Ahmadinejad regime who supported the protests that followed 2009's disputed Iranian elections, the media report said.
He was convicted of "propaganda against the system".
The Iranian director in his plea to the court said: "My imprisonment and that of those I work with symbolises the kidnapping by those in power of all artists in the country." (IANS)

description.hltext_display: Terkendala Cuaca Dingin, Atletik Hanya Sumbang 3 Medali
description.content:
Solo, CyberNews. Akibat terkendala cuaca dingin, atletik tidak tampil maksimal pada Asian Para Games Guangzhou, China, 12-19 Desember lalu. Hasilnya, berkekuatan lima atlet, cabang ini hanya menyumbangkan tiga medali bagi Kontingen Indonesia.
"Sangat dingin, antara 1-3 derajat Celcius. Anak-anak memang harus berjuang melawan suhu," kata pelatih atletik cacat Indonesia Waluyo, Rabu (22/12).
Tidak maksimalnya para atlet Merah Putih pada pesta olahraga bagi atlet penyandang cacat se Asia ini tampak pada Marthin Losu. Atlet asal Riau yang untuk tingkat nasional merupakan pelari terbaik saat ini seperti tidak berkutik menghadapi masalah nonteknis itu.
Akibatnya turun di tiga nomor (100, 200, dan 400 meter-red), Marthin hanya mampu finis di peringkat lima. Meskipun begitu, ujar Waluyo, Marthin masih mampu membukukan catatan waktu lebih baik dibanding saat latihan.
Tidak itu saja, peraih emas nomor 100 meter Kejurnas Atletik BPOC belum lama ini mampu mengungguli pelari-pelari negara di Asia Tenggara seperti Thailand dan Malaysia.
"Untuk 100 meter dicapai 11,5 detik, 200 meter dicapai 23, 38 detik, dan 400 meter dicapai 53,38 detik. Kami hanya kalah dari China, Irak, Iran," papar dosen FPOK UNS ini.
Untungnya, muka Indonesia sedikit terselamatkan dari tiga perunggu yang disumbangkan tim atletiknya. Tiga perunggu itu diperoleh dari dua perunggu Suyono (Jatim/T38) di nomor 200 dan 400 meter, serta Setiyo Budi Hartanto (Jateng/T36) di nomor lompat jauh dengan lompatan 6,3 meter.
"Untuk dua atlet lainnya, Johannes Bili (Jabar) dan Fransiska Beto Sogen (Jabar) belum bisa menyumbangkan medali," jelasnya.
Pada Asian Para Games ini, tuan rumah China menjadi kampiun dengan 185 emas, 118 perak, 88 perunggu. Negara tetangga Indonesia, Thailand mampu menembus lima besar dengan finis di posisi kelima lewat 20 emas, 34 perak, 39 perunggu.
Posisi negara Gajah Putih itu berada di bawah Jepang, Korea, dan Iran. Indonesia sendiri berada di posisi 14 dengan satu emas, lima perak, dan lima perunggu.

description.hltext_display: Mendiknas Berkunjung ke KPK
description.author: Susi Fatimah
description.content: JAKARTA - Menteri Pendidikan Nasional (Mendiknas) Muhammad Nuh mendatangi kantor Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi (KPK) sore ini.Belum jelas kedatangannya ke KPK untuk keperluan apa, namun saat ditanya wartawan perihal kedatanganya, M Nuh yang datang pukul 15.38 WIB menggunakan mobil X-trail dengan pelat nomor B 1138 RFS hanya mengatakan ingin silaturahmi.Mau silaturahmi saja, biasa, ujar M Nuh kepada wartawan saat memasuki kantor KPK, Jakarta, Rabu (22/12/2010).Kemarin sejumlah Pengurus Pusat Pemuda Muhammadiyah juga bersilaturahmi ke KPK. Mereka memberikan dukungan kepada Ketua KPK Buysro Muqoddas yang baru dilantik agar serius mengusut tuntas kasus-kasus korupsi kelas kakap seperti skandal Bank Century dan kasus Gayus H Tambunan.(ful)

Sveriges gruppspelsmatcher 13 januari kl 2015Sverige-Chile
15 januari kl 1815Slovakien-Sverige

18 januari kl 2015Sverige-Argentina

Därmed kom inte nuvarande skövdespelaren Andreas Nilsson med i laget.

Sverige inleder hemma VM med match mot Chile i Göteborg den 13 januari.

description.hltext_display: [2010 어워즈] 류시원, 3년연속 '올해의 인기상' 수상
description.content: 20일 서울 양재동 aT센터 그랜드 컨퍼런스룸에서 개최된 2010 한국모터스포츠 어워즈(주최 지피코리아)가 열렸다. 올해의 인기상에는 EXR팀106 류시원 감독겸 선수가 3년연속 수상했다.류시원 감독겸 선수는 팀 창단 2년만의 첫 시리즈 종합우승을 거뒀고 올해 결혼도 하며 새신랑으로써, 최고의 한해를 보내고 있다. 또한 인기상을 3년연속 수상하며, 명실상부한 최고의 감독겸 선수로 자리매김했다. 올해 5회째를 맞이한 2010한국모터스포츠어워즈는 200여명이 참석해 자리를 빛낸 가운데 성대하게 펼쳐졌다. 올해의 드라이버상, 신인상, 감독상 등 모두 15개 분야에서 21명의 영광의 얼굴들이 뽑혔다./지피코리아 뉴스팀 gpkorea@gpkorea.com, 사진=지피코리아 ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ [] []- Copyrights ⓒ 스포츠조선, 무단 전재 및 재배포 금지 -

description.hltext_display: Mais de quarenta mortos em desastres rodoviários
BAM heeft financiele overeenstemming voor bouw scholen in VK
description.content:
AMSTERDAM (Dow Jones)--Koninklijke BAM Groep nv (BAMNB.AE) heeft financiele overeenstemming bereikt met de Londense deelgemeente Camden voor de bouw van drie scholen.
Met het publiek-private bouwproject is een investering gemoeid van circa EUR90 miljoen. De financiering wordt verstrekt door Aviva.
BAM gaat een academisch gebouw bouwen voor University College Londen, alsmede een school voor speciaal onderwijs voor kinderen van 3 tot 19 jaar. Ook gaat het bedrijf een middelbare school in Camden renoveren. De oplevering van de eerste school wordt verwacht in juni 2011.
Door Archie van Riemsdijk; Dow Jones Nieuwsdienst; +31-20-5715 210, archie.vanriemsdijk@dowjones.com

description.hltext_display: Arabs vow to fight money laundering, terrorism
description.content:
CAIRO: Arab governments are getting together to fight terrorism by trying to dry up its supply of money, joining forces to battle money laundering.
The agreement to control money laundering is one of five signed by Arab interior and justice ministers. It calls on nations to set up their own programs to generate information and monitor money transfers.
The ministers met at the Arab League headquarters Tuesday, All 22 members signed the accords.
Their statement did not name terrorist groups, but several Arab countries are targets of Al-Qaeda.
Other agreements deal with organized crime, technical data fraud, counterfeiting, and pornography and sexual exploitation. They also signed an accord dealing with citizens of one nation who serve prison terms in other countries.
Speaking during the opening ceremony, Prince Naif Bin Abdul Aziz, Second Deputy Premier and Interior Minister, who is heading the Saudi delegation said a previously-signed Arab accord to combat terrorism and deviant ideology has created a solid ground for the region to unify ranks and shoot down this disease.
The Arab Accord to Fight Terrorism is a promise from the Arab states to fight this crime at all levels and the meeting reassures the security of the Arab people through security agreements signed by the members of the Arab League, he said.
Development of the Arab world will only come to life in an environment free of terrorism, corruption, and crime, Prince Naif said, emphasizing that a tough fight against crime is necessary to secure social prosperity.
Addressing the meeting, Prince Naif said, “You have come to reiterate your interest in an everlasting security and development for our Arab Ummah that has a unique harmony sharing one language, one religion, and one history, all boosted by the teachings of Islam that reject terrorism and extremism.”
Prince Naif’s speech at the opening of the meeting also focused on a comprehensive strategy for Arab security through the activation of security agreements and enhanced cooperation among members of the Arab League through the exchange of information and expertise to expose terrorism.
The fight against terrorism is a duty of the Islamic Shariah, which strives to save lives and property, Prince Naif said.
Prince Naif also conveyed the greetings of King Abdullah and Crown Prince Sultan and reiterated their support for all decisions serving the security of the Arab world.
– Okaz/Saudi Gazette � � � � � __

مهلت ثبت‌نام كنكور سراسري سال 90 امشب به پايان مي‌رسد
description.content:
داوطلبان تا ساعت 24 امشب مي‌توانند براي ثبت‌نام به سايت سازمان سنجش به نشاني www.sanjesh.org مراجعه كنند/اين دسته از داوطلبان مي‌توانند از 25 بهمن تا دوم اسفند ماه مجددا نسبت به ثبت‌نام اقدام كنند.
ایلنا: معاون سازمان سنجش آموزش كشور با اشاره به اتمام مهلت ثبت‌نام كنكور90 تا امشب، گفت: تا صبح امروز بيش از 880 هزارنفر از داوطلبان كنكور 90 تقاضانامه ثبت نام را تكميل كرده‌اند.
به گزارش خبرنگار ايلنا، حسين توكلي اظهاركرد: داوطلبان تا ساعت 24 امشب مي‌توانند براي ثبت‌نام به سايت سازمان سنجش به نشاني www.sanjesh.org مراجعه كنند.
وي در مورد داوطلباني كه موفق به كسب سوابق تحصيلي براي انجام ثبت‌نام نشده‌اند، افزود: ديپلمه‌هاي‌ سال 84 به بعد كه نتوانستند سوابق تحصيلي خود را از سايت دريافت كنند بايد تا 10 دي ماه همراه با مدرك ديپلم متوسطه، كارنامه فارغ‌التحصيلي، كارت ملي و شناسنامه و يك نسخه كپي آنها به اداره آموزش و پرورش محل اخذ مدرك ديپلم و در صورت عدم امكان به نزديكترين اداره آموزش و پرورش محل سكونت يا كار خود مراجعه كنند.
توكلي درمورد ثبت‌نام اين دسته از داوطلبان، خاطرنشان كرد: اين دسته از داوطلبان مي‌توانند از 25 بهمن تا دوم اسفند ماه مجددا به سايت سازمان سنجش مراجعه و نسبت به ثبت‌نام اقدام كنند.

description.hltext_display: Mourinho se queda mudo
description.author: AGENCIAS
description.content:
José Mourinho, técnico del Real Madrid, no ha comparecido en la habitual rueda de prensa previa a un partido, el de mañana miércoles de ida de los octavos de final de ante el Levante, y ha cedido la palabra a su segundo Aitor Karanka. Es la primera vez que el portugués no concede una rueda de prensa sin estar sancionado, situación que ya ocurrió en Liga de Campeones y Liga cuando fue castigado por su expulsión ante el Real Murcia en y por su comportamiento en Amsterdam ante el Ajax por la búsqueda de las expulsiones de Sergio Ramos y Xabi Alonso.
Mourinho no ha querido hablar y sí lo ha hecho Karanka que ha declarado que el portugués "no tiene ningún problema personal con nadie del club". "El míster no tiene ningún problema personal con ningún miembro del club. Como en cualquier sitio, tienen sus puntos de vista. En unos están de acuerdo y en otros en desacuerdo". Karanka habló de provocaciones previas a la discusión en la que el preparador de porteros del Real Madrid, Silvino Louro, empujó sin mirar a quien le frenaba en una disputa con miembros del banquillo del Sevilla en el descanso, y que acabó con el delegado Agustín Herrerín por los suelos.
"Nadie está cómodo cuando hay situaciones tensas, pero si estas en tu estadio y ves provocaciones... A nadie le gusta lo que pasó pero tampoco se deben sacar las cosas de quicio. Silvino es el que peor lo está pasando, en ningún momento se da cuenta de que empuja a Agustín. Entre ellos, que es lo importante, está todo solucionado. No van a venir de fuera para intentar resquebrajar nada", afirmó.
Por su lado, el presidente del Real Madrid, Florentino Pérez, ha respaldado a Jorge Valdano, su director general, al asegurar que es quien "mejor representa la imagen del club", después de que el técnico José Mourinho pidiera unión en el organigrama del club para no ser solo él quien defiende al equipo en todas las situaciones.
"Es costumbre del club no hablar de árbitros. Lo que teníamos que decir lo ha dicho Jorge Valdano, que es nuestro portavoz y el que representa mejor la imagen del club", ha asegurado Florentino Pérez en Punto Radio. Las declaraciones de Mourinho tras el triunfo ante el Sevilla y su petición de una reunión inmediata con el presidente del Real Madrid han sido definidas por Florentino Pérez como "una cosa accidental".
"Lo que pasó el otro día hay que verlo como algo accidental, no hay que darle más importancia. El Real Madrid es una institución muy solida y fuerte, con grandes valores e imagen, y pequeños incidentes como estos no deben perjudicar nuestra imagen. Son una anécdota", manifestó.
Ronaldo, con fiebre, entra en la lista ante el Levante
En el entrenamiento de esta mañana, Cristiano Ronaldo no se ha ejercitado por una fiebre que provocó que los médicos le mandasen a su domicilio y le hacen ser seria duda para el partido de ida de los octavos de final de ante el Levante que se celebra mañana. Cristiano puede perderse su primer partido de la temporada con el Real Madrid. Hasta el momento ha sido titular en todos los encuentros de las tres competiciones, incluida la eliminatoria copera ante el Real Murcia de Segunda B. Cristiano, pese a sufrir una amigdalitis aguda, ha entrado en la lista de José Mourinho que da descanso a Sergio Ramos, pierde por sanción a Álvaro Arbeloa y por lesión a Jerzy Dudek, Sami Khedira, Gago, Canales, Kaká y Gonzalo Higuaín.El portugués no comparece en la rueda de prensa - Cristiano Ronaldo, con fiebre, es duda ante el Levante

description.hltext_display: 임병석 C그룹 회장 또 추가기소하기로
description.content: [CBS사회부 김효은 기자] 검찰이 임병석(49) C&그룹 회장을 또 추가기소하기로 했다.C&그룹의 불법 비자금 조성 의혹 등을 수사하� 있는 대검찰청 중앙수사부는 서울중앙지법 형사합의24부(부장판사 조한창) 심리로 열린 공판에서 "올해 안으로 임 회장을 추가기소� 방침"이라� 밝혔다.앞서 검찰은 임 회장이 C&우방의 회계장부를 조작하는 수법으로 은행에서 8,800억여 원을 사기 대출 받은 혐의 등으로 지난 16일 임 회장을 추가기소했다.이에 대해 임 회장의 변호인은 "사실관계는 인� �하지만 � 의로 배임 또는 횡� �하� �는 의도는 없었다"며 "대출사기나 분식회계의 경우 경영상 판단에 의한 것으로 배임의 범위에 해당하지 않는다"� 혐의를 모두 부인했다.임 회장은 1,704억여 원을 사기 대출받� , 회사에 1,200억 원 상당의 손해를 끼친 혐의 등으로 지난달 9일 구속기소됐다.africa@cbs.co.kr[관� �기사](대한민국 중심언� CBS 뉴스FM98.1 / 음악FM93.9 / TV CH 412)www.nocutnews.co.kr) 무단� �재 및 재배포 금지

description.hltext_display: Auch Einzelkinder lernen soziale Kompetenz - Umfrage: Kontakte mit anderen Jungen und Mädchen können Geschwister ersetzen
description.author: Veröffentlicht von ots
description.content: (ots) - In Deutschland war 2009 jedes vierte Kind ein Einzelkind. Zeitgenossen, die hierin eine problematische Entwicklung sehen, weil ohne Geschwister aufgewachsene Menschen als eher unsozial und selbstbezogen gelten, mögen die Ergebnisse einer repräsentativen Umfrage der "Apotheken Umschau" beruhigen. Demnach glauben zwar 59,2 Prozent aller Befragten, dass Einzelkinder meist egoistisch und verwöhnt seien - eine Ansicht, die allerdings nur 29,9 Prozent der Einzelkinder selbst teilen. Doch diese Defizite seien nach Ansicht vieler Umfrageteilnehmer kompensierbar. Fast drei Viertel (73,2 Prozent) sind der Ansicht, dass Einzelkinder, die von klein auf Kontakt zu anderen Kindern haben, soziale Kompetenz genauso gut lernen wie Geschwisterkinder (Einzelkinder selbst: 83,8 %). Überhaupt scheinen Einzelkinder sozial nicht besonders aufzufallen. Lediglich 28 Prozent der Befragten geben an, sofort zu merken, ob jemand Geschwister hat oder nicht. Quelle: Eine repräsentative Umfrage des Gesundheitsmagazins "Apotheken Umschau", durchgeführt von der GfK Marktforschung Nürnberg bei 1.965 Bundesbürgern ab 14 Jahren, darunter 503 Einzelkinder. Diese Meldung ist nur mit Quellenangabe zur Veröffentlichung frei. Pressekontakt: Ruth Pirhalla Tel. 089 / 744 33 123 Fax 089 / 744 33 459 E-Mail: pirhalla(at)wortundbildverlag.de www.wortundbildverlag.de www.apotheken-umschau.de Weitere Infos zur Pressemeldung: http://

description.hltext_display: Une fillette de sept ans dont la vie a été sauvée est à l?origine d?une mission visant à sauver un millier de personnes souffrant de graves problèmes cardiaques dans le monde
description.content:
BIOTRONIK et collaborent pour changer les choses
Une fillette de sept ans dont la vie a été sauvée est à l'origine d'une mission visant à sauver un millier de personnes souffrant de graves problèmes cardiaques dans le monde , l'un des principaux fabricants mondiaux d'appareils cardiovasculaires implantables, a annoncé aujourd'hui une importante réalisation dans le cadre de son partenariat avec (HBI) : l'implantation d'un dispositif cardiovasculaire offert, pour sauver la vie d'Yuleisy Daniela Banos Peraldo, une petite Équatorienne de sept ans.
L'implantation a été effectuée après une procédure de remplacement valvulaire mitral par le Dr Gerardo Davalos de la « Fundacion Banco de Marcapasos », à l'hôpital pour enfants Baca Ortiz. La jeune patiente s'est bien remise de la procédure et a pu rentrer chez elle, auprès de sa famille.
« Sans le dispositif cardiovasculaire offert par BIOTRONIK, la jolie petite Yuleisy n'aurait pas pu vivre une vie d'enfant, pleine de liberté, d'amusement, d'audace et de joie. Sa santé aurait continué de se détériorer considérablement, jusqu'à ce que sa vie soit en péril », a déclaré le Dr Attilio Birga, Président de Heartbeat International Équateur. « Grâce à la collaboration mise en?uvre avec des entreprises comme BIOTRONIK pour fournir des traitements gratuits aptes à sauver des vies à des malades cardiaques dans le besoin, nous donnons à d'autres patients comme Yuleisy un nouvel espoir de mener une vie en bonne santé et d'envisager un avenir riche de possibilités ».
Chaque année, entre un et trois millions de personnes meurent parce qu'elles n'ont pas les moyens d'acquérir un dispositif cardiovasculaire. HBI, une fondation caritative à but non lucratif basée aux États-Unis, et BIOTRONIK se sont alliées pour faire baisser ce chiffre. BIOTRONIK fait don de dispositifs à HBI, laquelle gère ensuite le planning et supervise le réseau qui apporte les dispositifs aux médecins qui mettent en?uvre les procédures d'implantation.
« L'engagement de HBI pour sauver des vies dans les pays en voie de développement va de pair avec la détermination de BIOTRONIK à garantir que des malades dans le besoin ont accès à des dispositifs cardiovasculaires de qualité qui leur sauveront la vie, indépendamment de leur statut économique ou social », a déclaré Marlou Janssen, Vice-présidente mondiale du Marketing et des ventes chez BIOTRONIK. « Nous sommes fiers de faire partie de l'équipe de HBI et nous avons l'intention de continuer à soutenir les efforts admirables de la fondation avec pour objectif d'aider plus d'un millier de malades cardiaques grâce à des dispositifs BIOTRONIK au cours des 3 prochaines années ».
À propos de BIOTRONIK
BIOTRONIK figure parmi les principaux fabricants mondiaux d'appareils cardiovasculaires, avec plusieurs millions de dispositifs implantés, et est représentée dans plus de 100 pays. Ses effectifs s'élèvent à plus de 5 600 collaborateurs dans le monde. Réputée pour être toujours au fait des dernières attentes de la communauté médicale, BIOTRONIK évalue les défis rencontrés par les médecins et fournit les meilleures solutions pour toutes les phases des soins aux patients, qu'il s'agisse du diagnostic, du traitement ou du suivi. BIOTRONIK se définit par la qualité, l'innovation et l'excellence clinique, ainsi que par une réussite toujours renouvelée. La société jouit de la confiance des médecins et patients du monde entier, et leur apporte la tranquillité d'esprit qu'ils attendent.
www.biotronik.com À propos de , Inc. (HBI) est une fondation caritative à but non lucratif, membre d'Independent Charities of America. La mission d'HBI est de sauver des vies en fournissant gratuitement des dispositifs cardiovasculaires implantables et des traitements aux patients indigents dans le monde entier. HBI reçoit directement ses dispositifs de la part des fabricants d'appareils médicaux, puis les distribue via son réseau mondialde Centres du c?ur. On estime que de 1 à 3 millions de personnes décèdent chaque année car elles ne peuvent pas se permettre l'implantation du stimulateur cardiaque qui peut les sauver. Mais le problème ne fera qu'empirer puisque les maladies cardiovasculaires continuent d'augmenter dans les pays en voie de développement.
www.heartbeatsaveslives.com

Idhun Safaati Tembus Semifinal
description.content:
Bandung, CyberNews. Petenis Jateng, Idhun Safaati melangkah ke babak semifinal tunggal putri KU-16 Kejurnas Yunior FIKS-Telkom 2010. Dalam pertandingan perempat final Rabu (22/12) di Bandung, wakil Pati itu menang mudah atas petenis ibukota Devi Hasan lewat skor 6-1, 6-1.
Untuk mengamankan tiket final, Idhun mesti menaklukan Diandra Berliana yang juga meraup sukses di perempat final lainnya pada laga yang digelar Kamis besok.
Diandra, petenis asal Bekasi itu sebelumnya meredam Suryaningsih 1-6, 6-4, 6-4. Sampai pertandingan hari ketiga Kejurnas, wakil Jateng baik putra maupun putri lainnya yang turun di KU 12, 14, dan 16 tinggal tersisa lima orang.
Dari jumlah itu, dua di antaranya berasal dari tunggal putra KU-14 atas nama Anthony Susanto (Semarang) yang mengungguli Joel William 6-3, 6-2. Lainnya adalah Pambudi Elsa Wiguna (Blora) yang mengalahkan petenis Tegal, Akbar Hasian 7-5, 7-5.
Hanya saja, keduanya berpotensi bertemu di semifinal sepanjang mampu memenangkan partai perempat final atas lawan-lawannya Kamis (23/12) besok.
Di bagian putri KU-14, Deria Nurhaliza mampu memelihara peluangnya menjadi juara. Petenis Grobogan itu menundukan Dina Danata 6-0, 6-0 untuk mengamankan tiket semifinal. Petenis tuan rumah, Rifanti Dwi Kahfiani siap menjajalnya usai mengalahkan Angelica Irena 6-1, 6-2 di perempat final lainnya.
Di tunggal putra KU-12, Jateng menyisakan dua wakilnya lewat dua petenis Semarang. Zidan Harmy Ramadhan menang WO sedangkan Manggi Febian menang 9-7 atas Marga Bagaswara.

description.hltext_display: Atacante do Novo Hamburgo destaca vontade de marcar contra o Ju
description.content:
O atacante André Luís é uma das armas do Novo Hamburgo para o amistoso com o Juventude, marcado para as 20h (horário de Brasília) desta terça no Estádio Alfredo Jaconi. O atacante que já marcou gols nos coletivos falou sobre a vontade de já iniciar o primeiro amistoso com gols.
— Atacante vive de gols. Meu estilo de jogo é de não segurar muito a bola. Se estou com ela na frente do gol, chuto mesmo. Quem chuta faz — afirmou.
A equipe recebeu folga na manhã de terça-feira a reapresentação está marcada para as 16h30min, para o amistoso. Para o jogador, a atuação da equipe ainda poderá melhorar depois do trabalho.
— Vamos sentir um pouco no entrosamento, mas vamos colocar em prática o que trabalhamos — destacou.

description.hltext_display: 产业链上党旗红：记广河县城关镇十
description.content:
记广河县城关镇十里墩村党支部
一条洁净的水泥路沿着山势盘旋而上，满载着羊只的三轮车穿梭往来，一路欢歌；路侧的沟沟岔岔里，一道道梯田层层叠叠绵延而去……虽说是初冬时节，走进广河县南部干旱山区村城关镇十里墩村，映入眼帘的是一幅生机盎然的田园风光图，令人不禁感慨：这就是那个“吃水两肩挑，走路常绊倒”的十里墩村吗？
广河县城关镇十里墩村坐落在县城南部起伏的山梁沟峁之间，是一个典型的干旱山区村。近年来，村党支部充分发挥战斗堡垒作用，带领全村群众，修公路、通水电、调结构、重养殖，使一个贫困落后的后进村变成了“种养”齐头并进，社会安定、群众生活逐步富裕的先进村。2009年全村年人均纯收入达到2320多元，这一数字远高于全县平均水平。
说起这个村的脱贫致富路，还得从2005年说起。当时，县上引进推广种植脱毒洋芋、双垄沟播玉米等旱作农业技术。刚开始，大部分群众顾虑重重，不愿种植。于是，村党支部书记带头在自己田里试种了3亩脱毒洋芋、4亩双垄沟播玉米，当年获得了丰收。眼见为实，这项新技术开始迅速推广。如今，该村已成为全县的双垄沟播玉米种植示范村。
俗话说的好：“火车跑得快，全靠车头带”。党支部号召力的强弱，党员素质的高低，直接决定着群众脱贫致富的步伐。多年来，十里墩村坚持把加强支部建设、强化党员教育管理作为增强班子凝聚力、号召力的主要措施来抓，积极开展先进性教育、学习实践科学发展观和创先争优活动，组织广大党员认真学习了“三个代表”重要思想和科学发展观等党的最新理论，坚持“三会一课”制度，每月集中党员学习2次，每季度召开一次座谈会，教育广大党员加强党性修养，争当遵纪守法、勤劳致富的排头兵。
十里墩村历来就有搞养殖的传统，发“羊”财历来是群众的梦想。但一家一户的零散养殖，无法发挥规模优势，没有给群众带来实实在在的收入。在县上引导下，村党支部经过认真分析研究，认识到只有把分散经营的群众凝聚起来，发展规模养殖，才是做大做强畜牧产业的唯一途径。于是一个以党员为主体，以提供技术、服务为职责的“奋进养羊协会”应运而生。协会成立后，村党支部引导群众转变观念，科学规划，改变了分户养殖、单打独干的养殖习惯，走出了一条“人畜分离，联户养殖，集中管理，单独核算”的养殖新模式。这个养殖模式彻底改变了传统经营管理和疫病预防模式，减少了人力，减少了成本，调动了养殖户的积极性，进而扩大了养殖规模和养殖效益，养殖小区进入了良性循环的发展轨道，被县上总结为“十里墩养殖模式”，在全县范围内进行了推广。
与此同时，村党支部把解决“行路难、吃水难”问题作为头等大事，积极向县上反映情况，争取项目，县上先后投资150万元，拓宽村级道路15.5公里，修建便民桥１座。今年4月，长6.5公里的温家坪至十里墩农路和长５公里的十里墩至排子坪农路十里墩段硬化通车，全村的老百姓从此走上了宽敞平坦的水泥道路，极大地鼓舞了乡亲们脱贫致富的信心。为了让群众喝上清澈干净的自来水，村党支部组织村民义务投工投劳，投资60万元，埋设自来水管道13公里，彻底解决了群众“吃水难”的问题。

description.hltext_display: 'World's first' glasses-free 3D TV hits Japan stores
description.content:
TOKYO (AFP) - Toshiba on Wednesday launched in Japan what it calls the world's first television that allows viewers to see 3D images without the need to wear special glasses, amid intensifying competition in the market.
Curious shoppers stopped to test out the screen at an electronics store in central Tokyo as the 12-inch model of Regza GL1 Series went on sale.
The new model with a liquid crystal display carries a price tag of 119,800 yen (1,400 dollars). A 20-inch model will be released on Saturday.
The new 3D TV does not require users to wear special glasses, whereas other 3D-capable models require glasses that act as filters to separate images to each eye to create the illusion of depth.
Toshiba's screens use processing technology to create depth-filled images and the Regza GL1 Series allow users to switch between 2D and 3D on normal TV programmes.
Kazuhito Gunji, a public relations official at electronics retailer Bic Camera, said the company had received many inquiries from customers on when they can get their hands on the product.
Electronics stores are hoping that the release of the latest technology will help offset declining sales as government incentives for purchasing environment-friendly home appliances were reduced this month.
The hugely competitive TV sector is a challenge for many electronics makers given that customers are increasingly accustomed to declining prices, making it difficult for the industry to generate profits.
Sony on Monday said it may fall short of its sales goal of 25 million liquid crystal display TV sets this fiscal year as it struggles to be profitable in the sector, and has also embraced 3D TV technology.
Most shoppers were curious but also cautious about the new device on Wednesday, however.
"I want to watch on a big screen," said a 47-year-old man who has a 37-inch TV at home. "I'll wait for another year before buying," he said.
Another customer, 33, said: "It's great that we don't have to wear glasses, which is a nuisance."
"But I didn't feel images were flying out of the screen on some programmes," he added.
Toshiba says images on the 12-inch screen are best viewed from the front and some 65 centimetres (26 inches) away.
"Customers currently think of 3D images as just an add-on function... but 3D is expected to become a standard eventually" with 3D films and video titles increasing, said Toshiba sales official Eiichi Matsuzawa.
Rival Sharp earlier this year unveiled a small glasses-free LCD touchscreen that shows 3D images for use in mobile phones, digital cameras and games consoles such as Nintendo's 3DS, to be released in Japan in February 2011.

description.hltext_display: Al-Qaida in Iraq threatens attacks on Christians
description.content:
Al-Qaida's front group in Iraq is threatening more attacks against the country's Christians unless two women it claims Egypt's Coptic Church is holding captive are released.
The Islamic State of Iraq issued the warning in a message posted late Tuesday on a website frequented by Islamist extremists.
The group has made similar threats in the past linked to claims of Egypt's Muslim extremists that the country's Coptic Church is holding women captive for converting to Islam. The church denies the allegations.
The message was addressed to Iraq's Christian community to "pressure" Egypt.
The Islamic State of Iraq was behind a recent series of attacks, including the siege of a Baghdad church that left 68 people dead. Some 1,000 Christian families have fled Iraq since then, according to the U.N.
___
