description.hltext_display: Mordmisstänkt fortsätter neka
description.content:
Publicerat: tisdag 21 december kl 13:55, I dag fortsätter rättegången i Tåtorpsmordet och den 35-årige mordmisstänkte mannen fortsätter att neka till all inblandning i mordet. Vår reporter Tomas Ek finns på plats i tingsrätten i Mariestad och rapporterar från förhöret. Rättegången inleddes i måndags och väntas bli klar i dag. Den åtalade mannen är misstänkt för att ha slagit ihjäl en 62-årig företagare med en kofot för snart två år sedan. Under första rättegångsdagen framkom det att åklagaren tror att ytterligare en man medverkat vid dådet. Denne person är fortfarande fri och står inte åtalad.
Det är däremot en 39-årig kvinna, som är åtalad för skyddande av brottsling av grovt brott. Hon har berättat för polisen att 35-åringen bodde hos henne vid tiden då mordet inträffade. De ska även ha haft ett förhållande.
Kvinnan förhördes i går och nekar till all inblandning i mordet och säger sig inte ha någonting med det att göra.
Den mordmisstänkte 35-åringen nekar också till att ha begått mordet. Sent i går eftermiddag förhördes han och det är oklart om de förhören återupptas i dag.
I förhören i tingsrätten i går var mannen väldigt förtegen och sa egentligen ingenting. Det var alltså ingen större skillnad jämfört med vad som framkommit i polisförhören. Mannen påstår sig aldrig ha varit i Tåtorp och förstår inte hur DNA från honom har hittits på mordvapnet.
Tomas Ek
Tel: 0500 444482
tomas.ek@sr.se

description.hltext_display: Limerick Police look for men involved in retail theft, possible crime ring
description.content:
LIMERICK — The township police department is seeking the public’s assistance as it investigates individuals who stole clothing from the Philadelphia Premium Outlets Saturday afternoon and who may be linked to an organized retail theft crime ring.
Police Chief William J. Albany said Gap’s loss prevention officers discovered the theft after noticing a number of clothing items were missing and went back through surveillance footage.
When the store’s officers reviewed the footage, they found three men placed numerous items of clothing into shopping bags while a store employee was distracted by a woman, Albany said.
In total, 55 pieces of clothing were taken, valued at $3,647, during Saturday’s theft.
The individuals seem to be a part of an organized crime ring that targets Gap stores in outlets across the mid-Atlantic region, including in Tannersville, Pa., and northern New Jersey, Albany said.
Albany said the individuals fit the profile of other people who have struck other stores, but the department does not have an exact number of people involved with the group, just that they have surveillance footage of eight other people.
“They seem to be well organized,” Albany said.
The items that were stolen, including blouses, shirts and pants, are supplied to boutiques in New York City. A recent raid on a Queens, N.Y., clothing store recovered $328,712 in stolen retail clothing, $79,925 worth of it from Gap, he said.
Albany said the department has no way of knowing if the individuals who struck the Philadelphia Premium Outlets and other stores are connected to the raid in Queens, but believes they are part of an organized crime ring.
The individuals are targeting stores like the Gap because the clothing is in demand, is what consumers want and what they will buy it at a discounted rate, he said. Continued...
Reader Comments »
View reader comments (0) » Comment on this story »
“The nicer name-brand clothing is targeted for these types of operations,” he said.
The Limerick Police are working with Gap’s corporate loss prevention department and has entered the suspects’ information into a regional network so other police departments can track them.
“We’re seeing some successes,” he said.
The men are described as Hispanic, 5 feet 8 inches to 5 feet 10 inches, and are in their mid 20s to 30s and 50 to 60s.
Police are requesting anyone with information about the crime contact the police department at 610-495-7909.

LIMERICK — The township police department is seeking the public’s assistance as it investigates individuals who stole clothing from the Philadelphia Premium Outlets Saturday afternoon and who may be linked to an organized retail theft crime ring.
Police Chief William J. Albany said Gap’s loss prevention officers discovered the theft after noticing a number of clothing items were missing and went back through surveillance footage.
When the store’s officers reviewed the footage, they found three men placed numerous items of clothing into shopping bags while a store employee was distracted by a woman, Albany said.
In total, 55 pieces of clothing were taken, valued at $3,647, during Saturday’s theft.
The individuals seem to be a part of an organized crime ring that targets Gap stores in outlets across the mid-Atlantic region, including in Tannersville, Pa., and northern New Jersey, Albany said.
Albany said the individuals fit the profile of other people who have struck other stores, but the department does not have an exact number of people involved with the group, just that they have surveillance footage of eight other people.
“They seem to be well organized,” Albany said.
The items that were stolen, including blouses, shirts and pants, are supplied to boutiques in New York City. A recent raid on a Queens, N.Y., clothing store recovered $328,712 in stolen retail clothing, $79,925 worth of it from Gap, he said.
Albany said the department has no way of knowing if the individuals who struck the Philadelphia Premium Outlets and other stores are connected to the raid in Queens, but believes they are part of an organized crime ring.
The individuals are targeting stores like the Gap because the clothing is in demand, is what consumers want and what they will buy it at a discounted rate, he said.
“The nicer name-brand clothing is targeted for these types of operations,” he said.
The Limerick Police are working with Gap’s corporate loss prevention department and has entered the suspects’ information into a regional network so other police departments can track them.
“We’re seeing some successes,” he said.
The men are described as Hispanic, 5 feet 8 inches to 5 feet 10 inches, and are in their mid 20s to 30s and 50 to 60s.
Police are requesting anyone with information about the crime contact the police department at 610-495-7909.

description.hltext_display: NRW-Atheisten: Handreichung für konfessionsfreie Schüler
description.content:
Lindlar (ots) - Um den Jahreswechsel wählen viele Eltern die
Grundschule oder suchen nach einer passenden weiterführenden Schule
für ihre Kinder. Neben Bildungsangebot, Lehrerqualifikation und
Erreichbarkeit ist auch die weltanschaulich-religiöse Ausrichtung ein
wichtiges Kriterium für die beständig anwachsende Zahl
nichtreligiöser Eltern. Der Internationale Bund der Konfessionslosen
und Atheisten (IBKA) NRW stellt in seinem Internet-Angebot einen
Fragebogen für Eltern zur Verfügung, mit dem sie die Wahrung der
Religionsfreiheit ihrer Kinder bei Schulleitungen erfragen können.
"Die Teilnahme am konfessionellen Religionsunterricht und
Schulgottesdiensten ist für Schülerinnen und Schüler freiwillig. Das
regelt unser Grundgesetz. Viele Lehrerinnen, Lehrer und
Schulleitungen verwenden bedeutenden Ehrgeiz darauf, die
Freiwilligkeit der Teilnahme am Religionsunterricht zu behindern.
Hier werden die Grundrechte der nichtreligiösen Schüler massiv
verletzt!" sagt IBKA-NRW Sprecher Rainer Ponitka. "Manche
Grundschulen lassen Unterrichtsfächer beim gleichen Lehrer ineinander
übergehen. Der Religionsunterricht hat keine verbindlichen Zeiten im
Stundenplan. Es wird Eltern massiv erschwert, ihre Kinder vor
religiöser Indoktrination zu schützen."
Dem Fragebogen liegt die aktuelle Gesetzes- und Erlasslage in
Nordrhein-Westfalen zugrunde. Erfragt wird die Beaufsichtigung der
konfessionsfreien Schüler zur Zeit des Religionsunterrichtes, die
verbindlichen Zeiten des Religionsunterrichtes im Stundenplan, sowie
die Häufigkeit von Gottesdiensten im Schulhalbjahr.
Ponitka weiter: "Der Religionsunterricht hat die Aufgabe, die
Glaubensinhalte der Religionsgemeinschaften als bestehende Wahrheiten
zu vermitteln. Das hat das Bundesverfassungsgericht 1987 bestätigt.
Somit kann man den Religionsunterricht als pure Mitgliederschulung
der Religionsgemeinschaften bezeichnen. Nirgendwo sonst im
schulischen Bereich wird so viel kriminelle Energie darauf verwendet,
die bestehende Rechtslage zu umgehen und nichtreligiöse Menschen in
der Ausübung ihrer Freiheitsrechte zu behindern."
Der IBKA in Nordrhein-Westfalen berät seit dem Schuljahr 2007/2008
nichtreligiöse Schüler, Eltern und Lehrer und unterstützt sie in der
Wahrung ihrer Religionsfreiheit.
Über den IBKA:
Im IBKA haben sich nichtreligiöse Menschen zusammengeschlossen, um
die Weltanschauungsfreiheit und die konsequente Trennung von Staat
und Religion durchzusetzen.
Weiterführende Links:
Fragebogen für Eltern
http://www.ibka.org/frageGS-NRW
Schulrundschreiben 2009/10
http://ibka.org/node/897
AG Schule des IBKA
http://ibka.org/ag-schule
Originaltext: Internationaler Bund der Konfessionslosen und Atheisten e.V., Landesverband NRW
Digitale Pressemappe: http://www.presseportal.de/pm/78289
Pressemappe via RSS : http://www.presseportal.de/rss/pm_78289.rss2
Pressekontakt:
Rainer Ponitka
IBKA e.V., Landessprecher NRW

description.hltext_display: FOTO: Atacante Walter visita o Beira-Rio
description.content:
Jogador do Porto conversou com ex-companheiros do Inter B
O atacante Walter visitou nesta terça-feira o Estádio Beira-Rio. O jogador formado na base colorada, e que atualmente defende o Porto, de Portugal, reencontrou os amigos do Inter B no campo suplementar.
Walter conversou com o goleiro Agenor, com o zagueiro Dalton e com o lateral Bustos. O Inter B treina para a estreia do Campeonato Gaúcho enquanto o grupo principal do Colorado está de férias.
Foto: Alexandre Lops, Divulgação Inter

Conhecido como site de relacionamento, o Facebook permite aos seus usuários partilharem notícias com seus amigos e inseri-las na sua página pessoal.
Serviço de armazenamento e organização de favoritos online do Google.
Serviço no qual o usuário indica páginas de conteúdo para que sejam votadas por outras pessoas logadas à ferramenta. As mais votadas vão para a capa do site.
Site de busca de blogs e também ferramenta de favoritos. Através do Technorati é possível saber quantos sites apontam para determinado endereço.
Permite organizar as páginas favoritas e compartilhar bookmarks pessoais com outros usuários.
